recipes.name: Classic Beef Steak
recipes.title: Juicy Grilled Steak
directions: Season steak with salt and pepper.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Grill steaks for 6–8 minutes per side for medium doneness.
Top with garlic butter before serving.

recipes.name: Red Lentil Soup with Chicken and Turnips
recipes.title: Red Lentil Soup with Chicken and Turnips
directions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Lightly oil ramekins and add spinach.
Crack eggs into each ramekin and season with salt.
Bake for 12–15 minutes until whites are set.

recipes.name: Cookies
recipes.title: Homemade Cookies
directions: Mix beef, breadcrumbs, and Parmesan cheese.
Form small balls and brown in a skillet.
Simmer in tomato sauce for 20 minutes.
Serve with pasta or bread.

recipes.name: Sushi Rolls
recipes.title: Fresh Sushi Rolls
directions: Cook sushi rice and season with rice vinegar.
Lay nori sheet on bamboo mat, spread rice evenly.
Add cucumber and salmon, then roll tightly.
Slice and serve with soy sauce.

recipes.name: Rice and Beans
recipes.title: Easy Homemade Rice and Beans
directions: Sauté onion and curry paste until fragrant.
Add chicken and brown on all sides.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer until chicken is cooked.
Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Asparagus and Pea Soup
recipes.title: Asparagus and Pea Soup: Real Convenience Food
directions: Marinate pork with spices and pineapple juice.
Grill pork until charred and slice thinly.
Serve in tortillas with onion, cilantro, and pineapple.

recipes.name: Garlicky Kale
recipes.title: Fresh Garlicky Kale
directions: Chop tomatoes and cucumber.
Mix with feta cheese and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil before serving.

recipes.name: French Crepes
recipes.title: Delicious Crepes
directions: Mix flour, milk, eggs, and sugar into a smooth batter.
Heat butter in a pan and pour in batter thinly.
Cook each side until golden brown.
Serve with jam, chocolate, or fruit.

comments.body: Baked eggs are now my go-to breakfast.
Crepes turned out fluffy and light.
